B

b - Variable in class Board
 
Board - Class in <Unnamed>
This is a simple River Plank Puzzle Game implemented with Swing components.
Board() - Constructor for class Board
 

G

Game - Class in <Unnamed>
This is a simple River Plank Puzzle Game implemented with Swing components.
Game() - Constructor for class Game
 
gamePanel - Variable in class Board
 
getGamePanel() - Method in class Board
Returns the Panel which will contain the game and sets up a Grid Layout.
getMainPanel() - Method in class Board
Returns the Main Panel for the game, and sets up a layout which will display the plankHold at the top and the game itself in the bottom/centre.
getPlankPanel() - Method in class Board
Returns the Panel which will display the plankHold variable and tell the player how many planks they currently hold.
getWindow() - Method in class Board
Returns the Frame in which the game will run.

L

levelFour() - Method in class Board
Initialises the board according to the layout of the fourth level and incorporates Mouse Listener to register the players actions.
levelOne() - Method in class Board
Initialises the board according to the layout of the first level and incorporates Mouse Listener to register the players actions.
levelThree() - Method in class Board
Initialises the board according to the layout of the third level and incorporates Mouse Listener to register the players actions.
levelTwo() - Method in class Board
Initialises the board according to the layout of the second level and incorporates Mouse Listener to register the players actions.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Board
An example of usage
main(String[]) - Static method in class Game
 
mainPanel - Variable in class Board
 
mouseClicked() - Method in class Board
Registers the players actions with Mouse Listener concerning the placement/removal of planks.

P

plankLabel - Variable in class Board
 
plankPanel - Variable in class Board
 
playing() - Method in class Board
Runs constantly when the player is playing the game to ensure that the game updates the number planks being held and changes the level if it finds that the current one is finished.

W

window - Variable in class Board
